enWisdom: Knowledge without action is a plague
When you hear knowledge then treat it seriously and do not taint it with jesting, thereby making the hearts spit it out

Wisdom: عِلْمٌ بِلَا عَمَلٍ حُجَّةٌ لِلَّهِ عَلَى الْعَبْدِ
enWisdom: The goal of knowledge is good action

Wisdom: شَرُّ الْعِلْمِ عِلْمٌ لَا يُعْمَلُ بِهِ
enWisdom: The worst knowledge is knowledge that is not action upon
One who wastes his knowledge [by not acting upon it] faces turmoil

Wisdom: أَوْضَعُ الْعِلْمِ مَا وَقَفَ عَلَى اللِّسَانِ
enWisdom: The most victorious of all people is he who overpowers his vain desire with his knowledge

Wisdom: مَا أَكْثَرَ مَنْ يَعْلَمُ الْعِلْمَ وَلَا يَتَّبِعُهُ
enWisdom: How many are those who gain knowledge but do not follow it!

Wisdom: أَشَدُّ النَّاسِ نَدَماً عِنْدَ الْمَوْتِ الْعُلَمَاءُ غَيْرُ الْعَامِلِينَ
enWisdom: The most regretful of all people at the time of death are the scholars who don’t act on their knowledge

Wisdom: إِنَّمَا زَهَّدَ النَّاسَ فِي طَلَبِ الْعِلْمِ كَثْرَةُ مَا يَرَوْنَ مِنْ قِلَّةِ مَنْ عَمِلَ بِمَا عَلِمَ
enWisdom: The bane of knowledge is to forsake acting upon it

Wisdom: إِنَّ رُوَاةَ الْعِلْمِ كَثِيرٌ وَرُعَاتَهُ قَلِيلٌ
enWisdom: Verily the narrators of knowledge are many, but those who are careful of [acting upon] it are few

Wisdom: اعْقِلُوا الْخَبَرَ إِذَا سَمِعْتُمُوهُ عَقْلَ دِرَايَةٍ [رآية] لَا عَقْلَ رِوَايَةٍ فَإِنَّ رُوَاةَ الْعِلْمِ كَثِيرٌ وَرُعَاتَهُ قَلِيلٌ
enWisdom: Analyze the information when you hear it with the analysis of understanding (iein order to understand it), not the analysis of narration (iein order to narrate it to others), for indeed the narrators of information are many but those who consider it carefully are few

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَتَعَاهَدْ عِلْمَهُ فِي الْخَلَاءِ فَضَحَهُ فِي الْمَلَإِ
enWisdom: Whoever does not nurture his knowledge in solitude, it humiliates him among the people
